price: 在你们之前，有一些民众，曾询问过此类问题，嗣后，他们因此而变成不归信的人。
arabic: قَدۡ سَأَلَهَا قَوۡمٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكُمۡ ثُمَّ أَصۡبَحُواْ بِهَا كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qad sa-alahā qawmun min qablikum thumma aṣbaḥū bihā kāfirīna
